segments.text: There's a strange tension in this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything is happening simultaneously, but no one is connecting the dots.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the impending disaster building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is going to fall, I'm almost certain of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so flimsy; it's just asking to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water on the floor, it's a guaranteed slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me sad to think about the injuries that could occur.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's peaceful dish-drying is just a prelude to chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's setting herself up for a terrible surprise when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash of dishes and the splash of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like watching a train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This isn't going to end well for anyone involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's innocent mischief is so overshadowed by the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish things were different for them right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sense of dread is quite palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR
